cause.description:
Our cause is to help slow down the uses of fossil fuels, by creating more awarness of peak oil and the end of the carbon age and by implementing a stategy to deploy green energy and help build a green economy, also help build a green food supply network that will remain after peak oil. this in return if we did not need oil we would not have the need to war or destroy the enviroment.
1. to slow down the uses of fossil fuels
2. to help the enviroment
3. to help build a green economy
cause.mission: stop war of oil help enviroment and help build an green economy
cause.name: help stop oil from destroying our enviroment
